name: Heimat-Tierpark Olderdissen
activityInfo: Free park zoo, open 24 hours, with enclosures housing more than 450 species of animals & birds.

name: Sparrenburg Castle
activityInfo: Restored medieval fort with a visitor center, guided underground tours & a climbable 120-step tower.

name: Botanischer Garten
activityInfo: Botanical garden with heather, alpine & medicinal displays, known for its rhododendrons & azaleas.

name: Dr. Oetker Welt
activityInfo: Custard powder factory redesigned to house the world-famous culinary brand's museum, exhibitions & lecture kitchens.

name: Historisches Museum Bielefeld
activityInfo: Local history museum housed in a former spinning mill with exhibits focused on industrial heritage.

name: Kunsthalle Bielefeld
activityInfo: Iconic, cube-shaped modern & contemporary art museum, designed by Philip Johnson, with a sculpture garden.

name: LOOM Bielefeld
activityInfo: Modern mall offering 110 shops, including German & international brands, plus a bustling food court.

name: LENKWERK Bielefeld
activityInfo: Events, festivals & exhibitions in a contemporary vintage car center with seminar rooms & dining.

name: Obersee Bielefeld & Schildescher Viaduct
activityInfo: Popular grassy park offering a jogging path that encircles the lake, plus mini golf & playgrounds and scenic views of the railway bridge/viaduct.

name: Sch√ºcoArena (Bielefelder Alm) - DSC Arminia Bielefeld Stadium
activityInfo: Footall stadium used by local team Arminia Bielefeld. Experience the welcoming and raucous atmosphere of German football!
